name: Megan Nolan
who_you_serve: The podcast serves individuals seeking personal growth and mental wellness, including those interested in overcoming anxiety and improving their self-awareness.
what_you_do: Megan Nolan hosts the Movement, Mind, & Meaning Podcast, focusing on personal development, mental health, and self-awareness through various episodes that explore themes like anxiety, self-belief, and stress management.
current_projects: Upcoming workshops and episodes focusing on stress management and personal growth.
business_focus: Megan Nolan hosts the Movement, Mind, & Meaning Podcast, focusing on personal development, mental health, and self-awareness through various episodes that explore themes like anxiety, self-belief, and stress management. (mind-body wellness)
